Unless you send us a sure sign We\u2019ll have to change the Party Line. 'MacGregor swore an oath1 MacGregor swore an oa-th ngainsc the art department. he\u2018d walk into their land And teach them just what Art meant. 4 horses can be allowed If kept in tidy stables, hut the Railway Age is better, Fo4r that brought in time#tables. So always keep it presto, And never, never lento, loti can talk about the early But not late Quattrocento. bold 199 \n￼(Tune: Anything Goes) Yeats was almost Recommending Now God knows Zulfikar Ghose with it once before Rabindranath Tagore Then there came the even palmier days Stephen Spender Now he knows Zulfikar Ghose pushing Dom Moraes Got get at it to-day Be fanatic to-day Asiatic to-day Tres, tres syllabic to-day It\u2019s traumatic to-day You had better obey Who knows?
